channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine Withdraws From Vuhledar, Town Long Under Russian Attack
item.description: Vuhledar had been under assault for almost three years. Russian forces entered it after a furious battle, and Ukraine ordered troops to retreat.

item.title: Ukraine Withdraws From Vuhledar, Town Long Under Russian Attack
item.description: Vuhledar had been under assault for almost three years. Russian forces entered it after a furious battle, and Ukraine ordered troops to retreat.

item.title: Israel Bars UN Chief António Guterres From Entering the Country
item.description: Foreign Minister Israel Katz said the United Nations secretary general had not condemned Iran’s missile attack on Israel in strong enough terms. For h...

item.title: Nike stock dives after sneaker giant scraps investor day amid CEO shakeup
item.description: Analysts appear largely confident in Elliott Hill’s ability to spark a revival at Nike, but many also see a stock in limbo short-term.

item.title: Putin Tries to Recruit More Soldiers, Encourage Bigger Families
item.description: President Vladimir Putin is throwing ever more resources at two interlocked priorities: recruiting more soldiers and encouraging bigger families.

item.title: You can own one of Tom Brady’s watches—if you’re willing to shell out up to $800,000
item.description: The seven-time Super Bowl quarterback Sotheby’s auction begins in December.

item.title: Why Aflac’s CIO won’t ever be first to market with generative AI—but is still finding ways to adopt the technology

item.title: US, France and Britain Say They Helped Israel During Iran Attack
item.description: Israel has said that Iran fired more than 180 missiles in the barrage on Tuesday, but that most were intercepted.

item.title: The billionaire Murdoch heirs are battling for Fox News and their lucrative media empire in a Succession-style court drama
item.description: "'King Lear' is the greatest example in the English language of how not to do estate planning. This kind of reminds me of that."

item.title: Trump vs. Harris: How the election will affect EV adoption
item.description: With electric vehicles, there’s a sense we're in suspended animation, holding our breaths to see who wins the presidential election.

item.title: How Two Billionaire Preachers Remade Texas Politics
item.description: They control Republican politics in the state. Now they’re poised to take their theocratic agenda nationwide.
